sys_script.name: set Order Item yearmonth_planned_procure

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>x_yergb_bpm_order_item</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="x_yergb_bpm_order_item">plan_gr_dateVALCHANGES^ORlead_timeVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="plan_gr_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="lead_time" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>set Order Item yearmonth_planned_procure</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
if (current.plan_gr_date) { var mydate = current.plan_gr_date; var mymonth = mydate.split('-')[0] + mydate.split('-')[1]; current.yearmonth = mymonth; } var aa = new GlideDateTime(mydate + " 00:00:00"); aa.addDaysUTC(-1 * current.lead_time); current.planned_procurement = aa.toString().split(' ')[0] + " 00:00:00"; current.update();
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>hhkim</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-06-04 14:04:23</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>094cacd247264610d254bce5536d438b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>set Order Item yearmonth_planned_procure</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="BPM" source="x_yergb_bpm">41c8a9e73b1e4a10ec3cbf2a85e45ab7</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="BPM">41c8a9e73b1e4a10ec3cbf2a85e45ab7</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_094cacd247264610d254bce5536d438b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-06-19 05:45:11</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=094cacd247264610d254bce5536d438b"/> </record_update>
